effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Stormstrike, Lava Lash and Doom Winds by 5%, up to 25%. Maelstrom Weapon spenders have a 1.0% chance to remove Winning Streak! per Maelstrom Weapon spent.

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! the winds shift into Doom Winds for 3 sec. When Doom Winds deal damage, your next Crash Lightning deals 12.0% increased damage, up to 60.0%. This effect can be stored up to 10 stacks. Additionally, Crash Lightning deals 75% more damage to your main target.

Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! the winds shift into Doom Winds for 3 sec. When Doom Winds deal damage, your next Crash Lightning deals 12.0% increased damage, up to 60.0%. This effect can be stored up to 10 stacks. Additionally, Crash Lightning deals 75% more damage to your main target.
(2) Set: Stormstrike, Lava Lash, Ice Strike, and Crash Lightning deal 10% increased damage.
(4) Set: Activating Feral Spirits summons 1 extra Feral Spirit.

name: 85-Year Tenure Ring
description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 831,236 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Agility by 2,658, up to 13,292.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.8 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Horde Tabard
description: A fine tabard that provides no useful combat effects, but it will let everyone know you represent the Horde.
